data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio do Maracana.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
In the minute 3, Throw-in Flamengo.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Luciano (Sao Paulo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 5, Sao Paulo drive upfield and Gabriel gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Sao Paulo.
Flamengo take a 1-0 lead thanks to Pedro.
In the minute 6, Great play from Vitinho to set up the goal.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Flamengo.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Flamengo's Mauricio Isla has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 16, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Tche Tche grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 19, Gabriel of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
In the minute 22, Free kick Flamengo.
Flamengo's Vitinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sao Paulo defender.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Gabriel gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sao Paulo.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Throw-in high up the field for Flamengo in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 29, Flamengo have been awarded a penalty in Rio de Janeiro...
Diego (Sao Paulo) has received a yellow card from Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Tiago Volpi (Sao Paulo) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 30, Flamengo are awarded a penalty ... Bruno Henrique botches the spot kick!
Vitinho of Flamengo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, In Rio de Janeiro Flamengo attack through Vitinho. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
In the minute 34, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
Joao Gomes for Flamengo has been booked by Caio Max Augusto Vieira and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 36, Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Flamengo push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Pedro gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sao Paulo defence.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 37, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sao Paulo are pushing forward but Gabriel's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Sao Paulo.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Brenner is on target to give Sao Paulo a 1-2 advantage.
The second-half is underway in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 46, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 47, Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
Sao Paulo's Gabriel gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 52, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sao Paulo drives forward and Reinaldo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 54, Sao Paulo are coming forward and Bruno Alves gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 55, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Flamengo's Everton Ribeiro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
In the minute 58, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Sao Paulo.
Reinaldo gives Sao Paulo a 1-3 lead from the penalty spot.
Flamengo pushes forward through Pedro, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 64, Flamengo have been given a penalty at Estadio do Maracana...
Flamengo are awarded a penalty at Estadio do Maracana. Pedro takes the kick ... But misses!
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Flamengo throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
In the minute 66, Flamengo's Pedro has run offside.
Vitor Bueno is replacing Igor Gomes for Sao Paulo at Estadio do Maracana.
Flamengo's Bruno Henrique breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 67, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Flamengo.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Vitinho (Flamengo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo make their first substitution with Michael replacing Vitinho.
In the minute 76, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Important block from the Sao Paulo defence as Michael fires in a strike for Flamengo.
Joao Gomes hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Flamengo!
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
Dani Alves is booked for the away team.
In the minute 79, Flamengo's Gerson has been booked in Rio de Janeiro and will miss the next match through suspension.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a throw-in for Flamengo, close to Sao Paulo's area.
In the minute 81, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio do Maracana, Gustavo Henrique has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Great finish from Luciano to give Sao Paulo a 1-4 lead.
In the minute 83, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flamengo needs to be cautious. Sao Paulo have an attacking throw-in.
The away team have replaced Reinaldo with Leo Pele. This is the second substitution made today by Fernando Diniz.
In the minute 85, Leo Pereira is on a sub for Natan for Flamengo.
Lincoln is replacing Everton Ribeiro for the home team.
In Rio de Janeiro Sao Paulo drive forward through Vitor Bueno. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 89, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Can Flamengo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sao Paulo's half?
Caio Max Augusto Vieira will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo's Lincoln is on target but unsuccessful.
The match is over. Final score 1-4.
Fernando Diniz is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Pablo Felipe replacing Brenner.
